info.name: Progressbar - Gradient
info.description:
Gradient color for progress bar.

See also:
- style 1942.
- style 1958.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:
  • 2015-08-08: added unprefixed linear-gradient rule and syntax for compatibility with future Firefox releases.
  • 2011-04-22: use -moz-linear-gradient instead of data:URI image.
  • 2007-03-10: initial release.
